Our software is used by clients for various opportunities. More information about the Domain Registrar Script at www.registrar-script.cz.cc.

The dotFree Group s.r.o. is the first company in Eastern and Central Europe which is offering companies, brands and trademark owners to get their own new generic top-level domain (gTLD).
